newsitem.title: UK: British police battle riot in English city.
newsitem.headline: British police battle riot in English city.

text.p: British police were battling to halt a riot early on Monday in the eastern English city of Scunthorpe, the Press Association news agency reported.
"We are currently dealing with a big public order problem in Scunthorpe," a police spokesman was quoted as saying.
"It is on a large scale and has been going on for two hours."
The agency said there were reports that at least three police patrol cars had been overturned and set on fire.
The trouble started in a food takeaway shop in the city centre and spread when dozens of revellers from a nearby nightclub joined in, said the agency.
The cause of the rioting was unclear and no other details were immediately available.
